Articles.Content:
when I try to launch anything from the hanger the game hangs and becomes un-responsive. cant click anything and have to force shut down ksp. also cant seem to save anything in the hanger either.

Kerbal Space Program - 1.0.4.861 (WindowsPlayer) Steam

<edit> I tried reinstalling game, verifying cache integrity, and a new save. no help. <\edit>

<edit2> I have narrowed down the issue, it seems something in the associated save folder is messed up. When I move that save to a fresh install the problem carries over. if that save is not in a save folder ksp is fine, if it is it messes up the SPH in all other saves as well. </edit2>

OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit

CPU: Intel® Core i7-3930K CPU @ 3.20GHz (12)

RAM: 16331

GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (3072MB)

SM: 30 (Direct3D 9.0c [nvd3dum.dll 9.18.13.4475])

Edited June 25, 2015 by Narhalles
